an3.147:4.1: “Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an3.147:4.3: Sāvajjena kāyakammena, sāvajjena vacīkammena, sāvajjena manokammena—
an3.147:4.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an3.147:5.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an3.147:5.3: Anavajjena kāyakammena, anavajjena vacīkammena, anavajjena manokammena—
